Package view

Class WelcomeGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.WelcomeGUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ViewInterface

    public class WelcomeGUI
extends java.lang.Object
implements ViewInterface
    All the UI related to view of the Welcome, This is starting UI, which will later calls other Views to respond
    Author:
    Risk Team 20

      • WelcomeGUI

        public WelcomeGUI​(javafx.stage.Stage new_window,
                  RWMapFileController new_maprwController,
                  MapEditorGUI new_MapEditorGUI)

        new_window - is the main window on the UI check Stage}
        new_maprwController - is the map file read and write controller, check RWMapFileController
